src:
Statistik Laga Real Madrid vs Galatasaray: Rodrygo Jadi Pencetak Hat-trick Termuda Kedua
07 Nov 2019, 08:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kemenangan besar berhasil diraih Real Madrid dalam matchday ke-4 fase grup Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019). Melawan Galatasaray, skuat besutan Zinedine Zidane tersebut meraih kemenangan dengan skor telak 6-0.
Rodrygo Goes menjadi bintang pada laga kali ini dengan tiga gol yang dicetak pada menit ke-'4, '7, dan '90. Dua gol lainnya dikantongi oleh sang penyerang, Karim Benzema, dan hasilnya ditorehkan Sergio Ramos melalui titik putih.
Sayang, kemenangan kali ini belum menjamin tempat Los Merengues di babak 16 besar. Mereka masih harus meraih kemenangan pada laga berikutnya kontra PSG yang berlangsung di Santiago Bernabeu pada akhir November nanti.
Selain banjir gol, pertandingan kali ini juga menghasilkan beberapa catatan penting. Salah satunya berkaitan dengan Rodrygo Goes dan hat-tricknya. Informasi lengkap yang disadur dari OptaJose bisa disimak dengan melakukan scroll ke bawah.
text:
Action Statistics Real Madrid vs Galatasaray: Rodrygo Becomes Second Youngest Hat-trick Printer
Nov 7 2019, 08:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid's great victory in the 4th matchday of the Champions League group phase on Thursday (11/07/2019). Against Galatasaray, Zinedine Zidane's squad won with a landslide score of 6-0.
Rodrygo Goes was the star of the game this time with three goals scored in the '4, '7, and '90 minutes. The other two goals were bagged by the striker, Karim Benzema, and the result was inscribed by Sergio Ramos through the white point.
Unfortunately, this victory does not guarantee a place for Los Merengues in the last 16. They still have to win the next match against PSG which took place at the Santiago Bernabeu at the end of November.
In addition to the flood of goals, this match also produced several important notes. One of them relates to Rodrygo Goes and his hat-trick. Detailed information extracted from OptaJose can be listened to by scrolling down.
